about_the_game:
Important: Cursor Kingdom is currently in development, so in the demo version, you may encounter some bugs or gameplay issues. We'd love to hear your feedback to help us improve the game! We welcome any ideas you have for our games!

Demo Version Description

  • Tutorial for beginners

  • 10 levels of content experience

  • 7 towers, 3 magic cards and 5 types of enemies

About This Game

It's a tower defense strategy game in the style of medieval fantasy. Players will take on the role of the defender of the kingdom in the game, defending the kingdom's main fortress from being destroyed by the Goblin Legion. The only resource consumed in the game is the player's cursor time, which allows the player to kill goblins, cast magic, or build towers. Properly building towers with different functions can make the player's defensive front stronger, and with cursor and magic kills, it can defend against the attacks of increasingly powerful goblin legions.

Right-click the cursor to eliminate goblins

Defend against the goblin army's attack and wield your cursor! Fight for the protection of the kingdom!!!!

Left-click the cursor to build towers

The game features a variety of towers with different functions, which can be built by the player with cursor operations.

Different kinds of towers and free-layout operations provide more strategies for eliminating Goblin legions and defending the kingdom's main fortress.

Accumulate energy to release magic

Use the cursor to deal damage to the goblin to accumulate magic energy, and consume magic energy to unleash powerful magic!

The goblin army's attack

There are different types of goblins in the game, and the Goblin Legion's attack will become more and more powerful over time

The Goblin Legion will attack from all directions, and players will need to strengthen their defensive line as much as possible to defend the kingdom Citadel against the Goblin Legion's attack. Come on! Defenders of the Kingdom!

Game Features

🌟 Simple operation, all actions can be completed with just the cursor, the faster your hand speed, the more efficient the resource utilization.
🌟 A variety of magic and towers can be used together to create a strategic tower defense mechanic that won't stop brainstorming.

🌟 Goblins with different characteristics form a powerful goblin army, launching attacks in waves, hold on, we can win!

Are you ready, defender of the kingdom? The goblin army has arrived at the border of the kingdom. Bring out your courage and conviction, let's fight together!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5+ / AMD Ryzen5+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7+ / AMD Ryzen7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Cursor Kingdom Demo" is a medieval fantasy-style tower defense strategy game where you plan and use your cursor resources to defend your kingdom by building defenses and unleashing magic to repel invading goblin legions!
